original_text: You can eat any meat that people sell in the market. Do not ask questions about the meat. Do not cause your thoughts to have trouble.
korean_text: 무릇 시장에서 파는 것은 양심을 위하여 묻지 말고 먹으라

sentences.korean_translation: 너는 어떤 고기든지 먹을 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that people sell in the market
Do not ask questions about the meat
Do not cause your thoughts to have trouble
